Export.Routine: INTELE ;INTELE;WEM;ADRESSE AUS INTELE;16.04.2003 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| ADRESSE AUS INTELE ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| WEM 16.04.2003 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; NEW YI,SATZ,TELEPHONE,YOK QUIT:YINHALT="" SET TELEPHONE=$$^WWWUMLAU(YINHALT,1) QUIT:TELEPHONE="" ;KEINE GÃœLTIGE EINGABE ;no SET SATZ=$GET(^INTELE(YM,TELEPHONE,1)) QUIT:SATZ="" SET YOK=1 ;UEBERSCHREIBEN = OK FOR YI=3,4,6,10,12,16,22,24 DO QUIT:YOK=0 . IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)'="" SET YOK=0 . QUIT IF YOK=1 FOR YI=3,4,6,10,12,16,17,22,24 DO ;NUR WENN OK ;only when . SET %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_"D"_YI_"~"_$PIECE(SATZ,Y,YI) . QUIT QUIT
